HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Call of Duty: Zombies Pack has been updated to Version 1.4 |No large changes have been made other than combatibility updates to make sure everything is working smoothly. On other news! oversized weapons are now defualt within rimworld 1.4 and no extra mods are needed.

Call of Duty: Zombies Pack has been updated to Version 1.4.1 |With the release of 1.4 and Biotech I have decided to solely focus on 1.4+ of rimworld and discontinued the support of 1.1, 1.2 and 1.3. These versions can still be obtained by Github.
|New: Divinium or Element 115 is the new hot stuff that needs to be refined to be used. several of the weapons and buildings will now use Divinium as a resource to use. Divinium can be obtained by meteorites, trading, Quest rewards or Deep drilling!
Mod combatibility: Random Call of Duty Weapons now include Modern Warfare Weapon Pack Added Support for Rim-Effect: Core, Drell, N7, Extended Cut and Asari and Reapers Added Support for Cursed Guns Added Support for Vanilla Xcom Weapons, Plasma Weapons, Magnetic Weapons, Chosen Weapons and Laser Weapons No longer supporting Persona Bond Forge.
|Changes: Reearches have been reordered for better progression
